welcome.title: Welcome to FIUTAMI!
welcome.question: Do you already have a pet or would you like one?
welcome.hasPetResponse: Great! Let's register your pet together so we can enter the world of Fiutami.
welcome.wantsPetResponse: The world is full of wonderful animals. To help you find the right one, let's get to know you better.

registerPet.photoHint: Optional - you can add it later

q1.intro: Every animal needs your time and attention. Let's start here.
q1.question: How much time can you dedicate each day?

q2.intro: Some animals are more independent, others need company.
q2.question: How much time do you spend away from home?

q3.intro: Every animal needs its own space. Let's see what you can offer.
q3.question: What space do you have available?

q4.intro: To advise you well, we need to consider any allergies.
q4.question: Are there allergies at home?

q5.intro: Every animal offers a different kind of relationship. What are you really looking for?
q5.question: What do you want from your pet?

companion.title: Ideal companion
companion.description: Questions to find the perfect companion

c01.hint: Size affects space requirements, costs and daily management

c02.text: What energy level do you prefer?
c02.hint: Your pet's energy should match your lifestyle

options.high_desc: Always on the move, loves running

c03.hint: Consider your neighbors and building rules

options.low_desc: Some sounds here and there are fine
options.high_desc: No problem with barking or meowing

c04.text: How much do you want to physically interact with your pet?
c04.hint: Some animals love being held, others prefer their space

options.minimal_desc: I prefer to observe, little contact

c05.text: How long are you willing to commit?
c05.hint: Dogs live 10-15 years, cats up to 20+, hamsters 2-3 years

d01.text: What coat type do you prefer?
d01.hint: Coat type affects grooming needs and allergies

d02.text: What is the main purpose for the dog?

k01.text: Will the cat live indoors or have outdoor access?

s01.text: What type of small mammal are you interested in?

b01.text: What size bird do you prefer?

c01.text: How much time can you dedicate to walks?

c02.text: Do you prefer a more independent or affectionate pet?

c04.text: Do you prefer a small, medium, or large pet?

c05.text: How important is ease of training to you?
